segments.text: My parents are always saying I am not good enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They say my hair is too long , my room is too dirty and I am not good enough at school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t think they are right . I have tried my best and that's enough . It is unfair that they are always saying these thing . Sometimes I even feel deeply hurt .
segments.speaker: S1
